message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'd be happy to take it off your hands for $90.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I still need to make a profit. How about we discuss $110?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $110 is closer, I'm still not quite there.  How about we split the difference and settle on $105?
I see you're trying to drive a hard bargain, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a decent profit. How about we meet at $115?
